description: This file declares the 'Request' class within the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, which models a JSON-RPC request message. It provides methods for creating requests with a method name and parameters, generating unique request IDs, and converting the request to a string representation. It inherits from a base message class and manages an atomic ID sequence for request identification.

classes.name: Request
classes.description: Represents a JSON-RPC request message with methods to create, stringify, and manage request IDs. It inherits from a general message class.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Initializes the request with a method name and parameters, returning success status.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the request.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the request.

methods.name: generateId
methods.description: Generates a unique ID for the request, using an atomic counter.
